metadata.title: CVE-2022-34749 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In mistune through 2.0.2, support of inline markup is implemented by usingregular expressions that can involve a high amount of backtracking oncertain edge cases. This behavior is commonly named catastrophicbacktracking.

criterions.comment: mistune: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
